rule.name: DuplicateClassNameFound
rule.description: Duplicate %s name "%s" found; first defined in %s on line %s

rule.name: EmptyStatementNotAllowed
rule.description: Empty %s statement detected

rule.name: EmptyStatementNotAllowedWarning
rule.description: Empty %s statement detected

rule.name: ForLoopShouldBeWhileLoopCanSimplify
rule.description: This FOR loop can be simplified to a WHILE loop

rule.name: ForLoopWithTestFunctionCallNotAllowed
rule.description: Avoid function calls in a FOR loop test part

rule.name: JumbledIncrementerFound
rule.description: Loop incrementor (%s) jumbling with inner loop

rule.name: UnconditionalIfStatementFound
rule.description: Avoid IF statements that are always true or false

rule.name: UnnecessaryFinalModifierFound
rule.description: Unnecessary FINAL modifier in FINAL class

rule.name: UnusedFunctionParameterFound
rule.description: The method parameter %s is never used

rule.name: UselessOverridingMethodFound
rule.description: Unnecessary overriden method that simply call its parent

rule.name: Todotyp
rule.description: Comment refers to a TODO task

rule.name: InlineControlStructureNotAllowed
rule.description: This inline control structure is not allowed

rule.name: InlineControlStructureDiscouraged
rule.description: This inline control structures is discouraged

rule.name: LineEndingsInvalidEOLChar
rule.description: End of line character is invalid; expected "%s" but found "%s

rule.name: LineLengthTooLong
rule.description: Line is too long

param.description: The limit that the length of a line should not exceed.

rule.name: LineLengthMaxExceeded
rule.description: Line exceeds maximum limit of %s characters; contains %s characters

param.description: The limit that the length of a line must not exceed.

rule.name: DisallowMultipleStatementsSameLine
rule.description: Each PHP statement must be on a line by itself

rule.name: MultipleStatementAlignmenttyp
rule.description: Equals sign not aligned correctly; expected %s but found %s

param.description: The maximum amount of padding before the alignment is ignored
The maximum amount of padding before the alignment is ignored

rule.name: NoSpaceAfterCastSpaceFound
rule.description: A cast statement must not be followed by a space

rule.name: SpaceAfterCastNoSpace
rule.description: A cast statement must be followed by a single space

rule.name: SpaceAfterCastTooMuchSpace
rule.description: A cast statement must be followed by a single space

rule.name: CallTimePassByReferenceNotAllowed
rule.description: Call-time pass-by-reference calls are prohibited

rule.name: FunctionCallArgumentSpacingSpaceBeforeComma
rule.description: Space found before comma in function call

rule.name: FunctionCallArgumentSpacingNoSpaceAfterComma
rule.description: No space found after comma in function call

rule.name: FunctionCallArgumentSpacingTooMuchSpaceAfterComma
rule.description: Expected 1 space after comma in function call; %s found

rule.name: FunctionCallArgumentSpacingNoSpaceBeforeEquals
rule.description: Expected 1 space before = sign of default value

rule.name: FunctionCallArgumentSpacingNoSpaceAfterEquals
rule.description: Expected 1 space after = sign of default value

rule.name: OpeningFunctionBraceBsdAllmanBraceOnSameLine
rule.description: Opening brace should be on a new line

rule.name: OpeningFunctionBraceBsdAllmanBraceSpacing
rule.description: Opening brace should be on the line after the declaration; found %s blank line(s)

rule.name: OpeningFunctionBraceBsdAllmanBraceIndent
rule.description: Opening brace indented incorrectly; expected %s spaces

rule.name: OpeningFunctionBraceKernighanRitchieBraceOnNewLine
rule.description: Opening brace should be on the same line as the declaration

rule.name: OpeningFunctionBraceKernighanRitchieSpaceBeforeBrace
rule.description: Expected 1 space between the closing parenthesis and the opening brace; found %s

rule.name: OpeningFunctionBraceKernighanRitchieSpaceBeforeBrace
rule.description: Expected a single space character between closing parenthesis and opening brace; found %s

rule.name: CyclomaticComplexityMaxExceeded
rule.description: Function\'s cyclomatic complexity (%s) exceeds allowed maximum of %s

param.description: The limit that the complexity must not exceed.

rule.name: CyclomaticComplexityTooHigh
rule.description: Function\'s cyclomatic complexity (%s) exceeds %s; consider refactoring the function

param.description: The limit that the complexity should not exceed.

rule.name: NestingLevelMaxExceeded
rule.description: Function\'s nesting level (%s) exceeds allowed maximum of %s

param.description: The limit that the nesting level should not exceed.

rule.name: NestingLevelTooHigh
rule.description: Function\'s nesting level (%s) exceeds %s; consider refactoring the function

param.description: The limit that the nesting level should not exceed.

rule.name: ConstructorNameOldStyle
rule.description: PHP4 style constructors are not allowed; use "__construct()" instead

rule.name: ConstructorNameOldStyleCall
rule.description: PHP4 style calls to parent constructors are not allowed; use "parent::__construct()" instead

rule.name: UpperCaseConstantNameClassConstantNotUpperCase
rule.description: Class constants must be uppercase; expected %s but found %s

rule.name: UpperCaseConstantNameConstantNotUpperCase
rule.description: Constants must be uppercase; expected %s but found %s

rule.name: DisallowShortOpenTagFound
rule.description: Short PHP opening tag used; expected “<?php“ but found “%s

rule.name: DisallowShortOpenTagEchoFound
rule.description: Short PHP opening tag used with echo; expected “<?php echo %s ...“ but found “%s %s ...

rule.name: ForbiddenFunctionstyp
rule.description: The use of function %s() is forbidden

rule.name: LowerCaseConstantFound
rule.description: TRUE

rule.name: NoSilencedErrorsForbidden
rule.description: Silencing errors is forbidden

rule.name: NoSilencedErrorsDiscouraged
rule.description: Silencing errors is discouraged

rule.name: UpperCaseConstantFound
rule.description: TRUE

rule.name: UnnecessaryStringConcatFound
rule.description: String concat is not required here; use a single string instead

rule.name: SubversionPropertiesUnexpected
rule.description: Unexpected Subversion property "%s" = "%s

rule.name: SubversionPropertiesMissing
rule.description: Missing Subversion property "%s" = "%s

rule.name: SubversionPropertiesNoMatch
rule.description: Subversion property "%s" = "%s" does not match "%s

rule.name: SubversionProperties
rule.description: Error opening file; could not get Subversion properties

rule.name: DisallowTabIndentTabsUsed
rule.description: Spaces must be used to indent lines; tabs are not allowed

rule.name: ScopeIndentIncorrect
rule.description: Line indented incorrectly; expected %s spaces

param.description: The number of spaces code should be indented.
Does the indent need to be exactly right.

rule.name: ScopeIndenttyp
rule.description: Line indented incorrectly; expected

rule.name: ChannelExceptionWrongExceptionType
rule.description: Channel actions can only throw ChannelException; found "%s

rule.name: DisallowSelfActionsFound
rule.description: Static calls to public methods in Action classes must not use the self keyword; use %s::%s() instead

rule.name: IncludeSystemNotIncludedCall
rule.description: Static method called on non-included class or system "%s"; include system with Channels::includeSystem() or include class with require_once

rule.name: IncludeSystemNotIncludedExtends
rule.description: Class extends non-included class or system "%s"; include system with Channels::includeSystem() or include class with require_once

rule.name: IncludeSystemNotIncludedCall
rule.description: Static method called on non-included class or system "%s"; include system with Channels::includeSystem() or include class with require_once

rule.name: UnusedSystemFound
rule.description: Included system "%s" is never used

rule.name: FunctionCommentApiNotFirst
rule.description: The @api tag must come first in the @api tag list in a function comment

rule.name: FunctionCommentApiSpacing
rule.description: There must be one blank line before the @api tag in a function comment

rule.name: FunctionCommentApiTagSpacing
rule.description: There must be no blank line before the @%s tag in a function comment

rule.name: FunctionCommentTagNotAllowed
rule.description: @%s tag is not allowed in function comment

rule.name: FunctionCommentApiNotLast
rule.description: The @api tags must be the last tags in a function comment

rule.name: FunctionCommentApiTagIndent
rule.description: @%s tag indented incorrectly; expected %s spaces but found %s

rule.name: BrowserSpecificStylesForbiddenStyle
rule.description: Browser-specific styles are not allowed

rule.name: DebugCodeFound
rule.description: Call to debug function Debug::%s() must be removed

rule.name: FirebugConsoleConflictFound
rule.description: Variables

rule.name: AssignThisNotSelf
rule.description: Keyword "this" can only be assigned to a variable called "self" or "_self

rule.name: CreateWidgetTypeCallbackFirstArgNotCallback
rule.description: The first argument of the create() method of a widget type must be called "callback

rule.name: CreateWidgetTypeCallbackReturnValue
rule.description: The create() method of a widget type must not return a value

rule.name: CreateWidgetTypeCallbackFirstArgNotSelf
rule.description: The first argument passed to the callback function must be "this" or "self

rule.name: CreateWidgetTypeCallbackNoReturn
rule.description: The call to the callback function must be followed by a return statement if it is not the last statement in the create() method

rule.name: CreateWidgetTypeCallbackCallbackNotCalled
rule.description: The create() method of a widget type must call the callback function

rule.name: DisallowNewWidgetFound
rule.description: Manual creation of widget objects is banned; use Widget::getWidget(\'%s\'); instead

rule.name: EvalObjectFactoryFound
rule.description: Do not use eval() to create objects dynamically; use reflection instead

rule.name: GetRequestDatatyp
rule.description: The %s super global must not be accessed directly; use Security::getRequestData(

rule.name: ReturnFunctionValueNotAssigned
rule.description: The result of a function call should be assigned to a variable before being returned

rule.name: JoinStringsArrayNotAllowed
rule.description: Joining strings using inline arrays is not allowed; use the + operator instead

rule.name: ClassDeclarationMissingBrace
rule.description: Possible parse error: %s missing opening or closing brace

rule.name: ClassDeclarationOpenBraceNewLine
rule.description: Opening brace of a %s must be on the line after the definition

rule.name: ClassDeclarationOpenBraceWrongLine
rule.description: Opening brace of a %s must be on the line following the %s declaration; found %s line(s)

rule.name: ClassDeclarationOpenBraceNotAlone
rule.description: Opening %s brace must be on a line by itself

rule.name: ClassDeclarationSpaceBeforeBrace
rule.description: Expected %s spaces before opening brace; %s found

param.description: The number of spaces code should be indented.

rule.description: Incorrect tag indentation in class comment

rule.description: Missing %s doc comment in class

rule.description: Param name does not match function comment

rule.description: Missing @%s tag in %s comment

rule.description: A hyphen must be used between the earliest and latest year

rule.description: @copyright tag must contain a year and the name of the copyright holder

rule.name: OpacityInvalid
rule.description: Opacity values must be between 0 and 1

rule.name: OpacitySpacingAfterPoint
rule.description: Opacity values must have a single value after the decimal point

rule.description: Opacity values must not start with a decimal point; use 0%s instead

rule.name: OpacityInvalid
rule.description: Opacity values must be between 0 and 1

rule.name: SemicolonSpacingNotAtEnd
rule.description: Style definitions must end with a semicolon

rule.name: SemicolonSpacingSpaceFound

rule.description: %s keyword must be lowercase; expected "%s" but found "%s

rule.description: Multi-line function declarations must define one parameter per line

rule.description: Function name "%s" is not in camel caps format

rule.description: Variable "%s" is not in valid camel caps format

rule.description: Variable "%s" is not in valid camel caps format

rule.description: Private member variable "%s" must contain a leading underscore

rule.name: ValidVariableNameMemberNotCamelCaps

rule.name: ValidVariableNameStringNotCamelCaps
rule.description: Variable "%s" is not in valid camel caps format

rule.name: DisallowObjectStringIndexFound
rule.description: Object indexes must be written in dot notation

rule.name: ObjectInstantiationNotAssigned
rule.description: New objects must be assigned to a variable

rule.name: ObjectMemberCommaMissing
rule.description: Last member of object must not be followed by a comma

rule.name: ComparisonOperatorUsageNotAllowed
rule.description: Operator %s prohibited; use %s instead

rule.name: ComparisonOperatorUsageImplicitTrue
rule.description: Implicit true comparisons prohibited; use === TRUE instead

rule.name: ComparisonOperatorUsageImplicitTrue
rule.description: Implicit true comparisons prohibited; use === TRUE instead

rule.name: IncrementDecrementUsageNotAllowed
rule.description: Increment and decrement operators cannot be used in an arithmetic operation

rule.name: IncrementDecrementUsageNoBrackets
rule.description: Increment and decrement operators must be bracketed when used in string concatenation

rule.name: IncrementDecrementUsage
rule.description: Increment

rule.name: ValidLogicalOperatorsNotAllowed
rule.description: Logical operator "%s" is prohibited; use "%s" instead

rule.name: CommentedOutCodeFound
rule.description: This comment is %s%% valid code; is this commented out code?

rule.name: DisallowComparisonAssignmentAssignedComparison
rule.description: The value of a comparison must not be assigned to a variable

rule.name: DisallowComparisonAssignmentAssignedBool
rule.description: The value of a boolean operation must not be assigned to a variable

rule.name: DisallowMultipleAssignmentsFound
rule.description: Assignments must be the first block of code on a line

rule.name: DisallowSizeFunctionsInLoopsFound
rule.description: The use of %s inside a loop condition is not allowed; assign the return value to a variable and use the variable in the loop condition instead

rule.description: Empty embedded PHP tag found

rule.description: Blank line found at start of embedded PHP content

rule.description: Blank line found at end of embedded PHP content

rule.description: Closing PHP tag must be on a line by itself

rule.description: Empty embedded PHP tag found

rule.name: EmbeddedPhpNoSemicolon
rule.description: Inline PHP statement must end with a semicolon

rule.description: Inline PHP statement must contain one statement per line; %s found

rule.description: Expected 1 space before closing PHP tag; 0 found

rule.name: EmbeddedPhpSpacingBeforeClose
rule.description: Expected 1 space before closing PHP tag; %s found

rule.name: EvalDiscouraged
rule.description: Use of eval() is discouraged

rule.name: GlobalKeywordNotAllowed
rule.description: Use of the "global" keyword is forbidden; use "$GLOBALS[\'%s\']" instead

rule.name: HeredocNotAllowed
rule.description: Use of heredoc syntax ("<<<") is not allowed; use standard strings or inline HTML instead

rule.name: InnerFunctionsNotAllowed
rule.description: The use of inner functions is forbidden

rule.name: LowercasePHPFunctionsKeywordUppercase
rule.description: %s keyword must be lowercase; expected "%s" but found "%s

rule.name: LowercasePHPFunctionsCallUppercase
rule.description: Calls to inbuilt PHP functions must be lowercase; expected "%s" but found "%s

rule.name: NonExecutableCodeUnreachable
rule.description: Code after %s statement cannot be executed

rule.name: NonExecutableCodeReturnNotRequired
rule.description: Empty return statement not required here

rule.name: MemberVarScopeMissing
rule.description: Scope modifier not specified for member variable "%s

rule.name: MethodScopeMissing
rule.description: No scope modifier specified for function "%s

rule.name: StaticThisUsageFound
rule.description: Usage of "$this" in static methods will cause runtime errors

rule.name: DoubleQuoteUsageContainsVar
rule.description: Variable "%s" not allowed in double quoted string; use concatenation instead

rule.name: DoubleQuoteUsageNotRequired
rule.description: String %s does not require double quotes; use single quotes instead

rule.name: EchoedStringsHasBracket
rule.description: Echoed strings should not be bracketed

rule.name: CastSpacingContainsWhiteSpace
rule.description: Cast statements must not contain whitespace; expected "%s" but found "%s

rule.name: ControlStructureSpacingSpacingAfterOpenBrace
rule.description: Expected 0 spaces after opening bracket; %s found

rule.name: ControlStructureSpacingSpaceBeforeCloseBrace
rule.description: Expected 0 spaces before closing bracket; %s found

rule.name: ControlStructureSpacingSpacingBeforeOpen
rule.description: Blank line found at start of control structure

rule.name: ControlStructureSpacingSpacingAfterClose
rule.description: Blank line found at end of control structure

rule.name: ControlStructureSpacingLineAfterClose
rule.description: Blank line found after control structure

rule.name: ControlStructureSpacingNoLineAfterClose
rule.description: No blank line found after control structure

rule.name: FunctionClosingBraceSpaceSpacingBetween
rule.description: The opening and closing braces of empty functions must be directly next to each other; e.g.

rule.name: FunctionClosingBraceSpaceContentBeforeClose
rule.description: Closing brace of nested function must be on a new line

rule.name: FunctionClosingBraceSpaceSpacingBeforeNestedClose
rule.description: Expected 0 blank lines before closing brace of nested function; %s found

rule.name: FunctionClosingBraceSpaceSpacingBeforeClose
rule.description: Expected 1 blank line before closing function brace; %s found

rule.name: FunctionOpeningBraceSpaceSpacingAfter
rule.description: Expected 0 blank lines after opening function brace; %s found

rule.name: FunctionOpeningBraceSpaceSpacingAfterNested
rule.description: Expected 0 blank lines before opening brace of nested function; %s found

rule.name: FunctionOpeningBraceSpaceContentBefore
rule.description: Opening brace should be on a new line

rule.name: FunctionOpeningBraceSpaceSpacingBefore
rule.description: Opening brace should be on the line after the declaration; found %s blank line(s)

rule.name: FunctionSpacingAfter
rule.description: Expected 2 blank lines after function; %s found

rule.name: FunctionSpacingBefore
rule.description: Expected 2 blank lines before function; %s found

rule.name: LanguageConstructSpacingIncorrectSingle
rule.description: Language constructs must be followed by a single space; expected 1 space but found %s

rule.name: LanguageConstructSpacingIncorrect
rule.description: Language constructs must be followed by a single space; expected "%s" but found "%s

rule.name: LogicalOperatorSpacingNoSpaceBefore
rule.description: Expected 1 space before logical operator; 0 found

rule.name: LogicalOperatorSpacingTooMuchSpaceBefore
rule.description: Expected 1 space before logical operator; %s found

rule.name: LogicalOperatorSpacingNoSpaceAfter
rule.description: Expected 1 space after logical operator; 0 found

rule.name: LogicalOperatorSpacingTooMuchSpaceAfter
rule.description: Expected 1 space after logical operator; %s found

rule.name: MemberVarSpacingAfter
rule.description: Expected 1 blank line before member var; %s found

rule.name: ObjectOperatorSpacingBefore
rule.description: Space found before object operator

rule.name: ObjectOperatorSpacingAfter
rule.description: Space found after object operator

rule.name: OperatorSpacingNoSpaceBeforeAmp
rule.description: Expected 1 space before "&" operator; 0 found

rule.name: OperatorSpacingSpacingBeforeAmp
rule.description: Expected 1 space before "&" operator; %s found

rule.name: OperatorSpacingNoSpaceAfterAmp
rule.description: Expected 1 space after "&" operator; 0 found

rule.name: OperatorSpacingSpacingAfterAmp
rule.description: Expected 1 space after "&" operator; %s found

rule.name: OperatorSpacingNoSpaceBefore
rule.description: Expected 1 space before \"$operator\"; 0 found

rule.name: OperatorSpacingSpacingBefore
rule.description: Expected 1 space before "%s"; %s found

rule.name: OperatorSpacingNoSpaceAfter
rule.description: Expected 1 space after \"$operator\"; 0 found

rule.name: OperatorSpacingSpacingAfter
rule.description: Expected 1 space after "%s"; %s found

rule.name: PropertyLabelSpacingBefore
rule.description: There must be no space before the colon in a property/label declaration

rule.name: PropertyLabelSpacingAfter
rule.description: There must be a single space after the colon in a property/label declaration

rule.name: ScopeClosingBraceContentBefore
rule.description: Closing brace must be on a line by itself

rule.name: ScopeClosingBraceIndent
rule.description: Closing brace indented incorrectly; expected %s spaces

rule.name: ScopeKeywordSpacingIncorrect
rule.description: Scope keyword "%s" must be followed by a single space

rule.name: SemicolonSpacingIncorrect
rule.description: Space found before semicolon; expected "%s" but found "%s

rule.name: SuperfluousWhitespaceEmptyLines
rule.description: Functions must not contain multiple empty lines in a row; found %s empty lines

rule.name: ClosingTagNotAllowed
rule.description: A closing tag is not permitted at the end of a PHP file

rule.name: ValidVariableNameNotCamelCaps
rule.description: Variable "%s" is not in valid camel caps format

rule.name: ValidVariableNameNotCamelCaps
rule.description: Variable "%s" is not in valid camel caps format

rule.name: ValidVariableNamePublicHasUnderscore
rule.description: Public member variable "%s" must not contain a leading underscore

rule.name: ValidVariableNamePrivateNoUnderscore
rule.description: %s member variable "%s" must contain a leading underscore

rule.name: ValidVariableNameMemberVarNotCamelCaps
rule.description: Variable "%s" is not in valid camel caps format

rule.name: ValidVariableNameStringVarNotCamelCaps
rule.description: Variable "%s" is not in valid camel caps format
